sentences: Eesti ühiskonnas on homod endiselt diskrimineeritud.
context: In Estonian, 'homo' is an abbreviation/slang term for 'homoseksualist', which means homosexual or gay person. It's commonly used in everyday language to refer to someone who is attracted to people of the same gender. The word can be neutral in some contexts but might carry negative connotations depending on how it's used and by whom.
